com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface ICodeGroupService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
CodeGroupService
public interface ICodeGroupService
extends IService

The interface for the CodeGroupService class The CodeGroupService class provides services to manipuate code group data in the database.

Method Summary

createCodeGroup

boolean createCodeGroup(PCSession session,
                        java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                        java.lang.String sAuthor,
                        java.lang.String sName,
                        java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                        java.util.Date dModificationDate)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a new code group to the database and returns it if successful

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the new code group to add.
String - sAuthor, the author of the new code group.
String - sName, the name of the new code group.
java.util.Date - dCreationDate, the creation date of the new code group.
java.util.Date - dModificationDate, the modification date of the new code group.
Returns:
boolean, indicates if the new code group was successfully added.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException, - if something went wrong adding the new code group to the database.
java.sql.SQLException

Delete a codegroup from the database and returns if it is successful.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to delete.
Returns:
boolean, indicates if the code group was successfully deleted.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

                java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                java.lang.String sUserID)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
Set the Name of the group to the given name.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to set the name of.
String - sName, the new name of the code group.
java.util.Date - dModificationDate, the modification date of the code group name.
String - sUserID, the id of the user setting the name of the code group.
Returns:
boolean, indicates if the new name was successfully added.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException, - if something went wrong setting the new name in the database.
java.sql.SQLException
